name: Lee Marketing and Advertising Group
description:
Lee Marketing and Advertising Group is a marketing mastermind that builds and moves brands through hardcore strategies. A gang of strategic gamblers and creative risk-takers based in the Sacramento, we do not hesitate to make bold actions for our clients. Our main plot is to boost brand visibility through dynamic tactics that will overthrow industry big guns.
Creativity is our weapon. We strive to produce messages that will resonate through the right medium to the accurate target market.
